sendEther(address,uint256,uint256).details: send ether to provided address and/or increase user's contract balance

params._amountToDeposit: the amount of ether to deposit into the contract. Can be zero.
params._amountToSend: the amount of ether sent to the provided address
params._to: the destination address to which the ether is sent

getBalance().notice: Returns the ether balance available inside the contract

sendEther(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Send ether to an address(including yourself)By sending funds to your own address, the funds are kept within the contract and available for later useBy keeping funds into the contract, it increases the transaction privacy but the risk as wellDO NOT KEEP LARGE AMOUNTS INTO THE CONTRACT
